Package permafrost.tundra.server.invoke

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractInvokeChainProcessor
    An abstract base class for invoke chain processors.
    DeferHelper
    A collection of convenience methods for invoking services.
    ExceptionLoggingProcessor
    A service invocation processor that logs service exceptions to the server error log.
    PackageInstallProcessor
    Runs any install services found in a package after it is installed, and any uninstall services found in a package prior to it being uninstalled.
    PipelineCaptureProcessor
    A service invocation processor that saves input and output pipelines to disk.
    RetryableServiceProcessor
    Converts any exceptions thrown by a registered service invocation to be instances of ISRuntimeException to support being retried.
    ServiceStatisticsProcessor
    An invocation chain processor which collects service invocation duration statistics.
    ServiceUsageProcessor
    An invocation chain processor which provides visibility into currently executing services.
    ThreadNameProcessor
    A service invocation processor that sets more descriptive thread names on invocation threads.
    TriggerRetryProcessor
    Converts any exceptions thrown by a trigger service to be instances of ISRuntimeException to support being retried.
